verse.roman:
sarva-veda-mayenedam
ātmanātmātma-yoninā
prajāḥ sṛja yathā-pūrvaṁ
yāś ca mayy anuśerate

synonyms: sarva—all; veda-mayena—under complete Vedic wisdom; idam—this; ātmanā—by the body; ātmā—you; ātma-yoninā—directly born of the Lord; prajāḥ—living entities; sṛja—generate; yathā-pūrvam—as it was hereinbefore; yāḥ—which; ca—also; mayi—in Me; anuśerate—lie.
translation: By following My instructions you can now generate the living entities as before, by dint of your complete Vedic wisdom and the body you have directly received from Me, the supreme cause of everything.
